CustomField.formula: IF(Adjuster__r.State='NB', '20 Hector Gate, Suite 200, Dartmouth, NS B3B 0K3',IF(ISBLANK(Adjuster__r.Street), '', Adjuster__r.Street+', ')+ IF(ISBLANK(Adjuster__r.City), '', Adjuster__r.City+', ')+IF(ISBLANK(Adjuster__r.State), '', Adjuster__r.State+', ')+IF(ISBLANK(Adjuster__r.PostalCode), '', Adjuster__r.PostalCode))
CustomField.label: Adjuster Address
